# Harald Revery - Official Website
> Electronic Music Producer & DJ | From the Scandinavian Forests to the EDM Stage

## Overview
Harald Revery is a contemporary electronic music producer and DJ based in Gothenburg, Sweden. He specializes in festival house, melodic house, techno, and progressive house. His work is defined by a fusion of Scandinavian natural beauty—serene forests and mountain landscapes—with high-energy electronic dance music.

**Website**: https://haraldrevery.com  
**Location**: Gothenburg, Sweden  
**Primary Genres**: Festival House, Melodic House, Techno, Progressive House, Deep House, Experimental

## Artist Profile

### Musical Identity
Harald Revery's sound bridges the gap between atmospheric, emotionally-driven soundscapes and mainstage-ready energy.

- **Signature Sound**: Nature-inspired, melodic, and emotionally driven EDM
- **Key Genres**: Melodic House, Festival House, Deep Techno, Progressive House, Trap-influenced beats
- **Influences**: Scandinavian wilderness, Nordic landscapes, mountain ranges, forest atmospheres
- **Production Style**: Technical precision meets organic emotion

### Artistic Vision & Symbolism
The project translates the serenity of the Nordic wilderness into sonic experiences designed for both massive festival stages and intimate listening. The "H" logo represents the split branches of a tree, symbolizing his birth name and the organic roots of his sound—connecting natural growth with electronic evolution.

### Background & Education
- **Early Start**: Began self-teaching music production at age 15
- **Academic Background**: Holds a Bachelor's degree in Engineering Physics, bringing a technical and methodical approach to sound design and production
- **Origin**: Born and raised in Sweden, deeply connected to Scandinavian culture
- **Base**: Currently based in Gothenburg, Sweden's music hub

## Music & Discography

### Official Releases (with ISRC Codes)
- **Spiritless** - ISRC: QZANL1736598
- **Phrases** - ISRC: QZWFL2416355 (Orange/rose gradient aesthetic)
- **Hollow** - ISRC: QZANL1736602
- **Mystery Card** - ISRC: QZ9JZ1740891 (Grey/light blue, mysterious ambiance)
- **Mirth** - ISRC: QZDA81865578
- **The North** (feat. Light Titum) - Nordic collaboration, sky blue aesthetic
- **Forest Rain** - Green/white gradient, nature-inspired
- **Looking for Snow** - Winter themes, sky blue and white
- **The Last Forest** - Deep connection to wilderness preservation
- **Uninhabited Island** - Dark green gradients, isolated atmospheres
- **Clouds and Roads** - Turquoise blue tones, journey-themed
- **Isolated** - Introspective moods, sky blue gradients

### Musical Themes
Harald Revery's catalog explores:
- **Nature**: Forests, mountains, islands, wilderness, seasons
- **Weather**: Snow, rain, clouds, Nordic climate phenomena
- **Emotions**: Isolation, mystery, reverie, mirth, exploration
- **Journey**: Roads, travel, discovery, transformation

- **SoundCloud**: https://soundcloud.com/haraldrevery

- **Facebook**: https://www.facebook.com/HaraldRevery
- **Twitter/X**: https://twitter.com/haraldrevery
- **Behance**: https://www.behance.net/haraldrevery (visual design portfolio)

## Website Structure

### Main Pages
- **[Homepage](https://haraldrevery.com/)**: Hero section with animated logo, visual effects, and introduction
- **[Music](https://haraldrevery.com/music)**: Internal web audio player with full tracklist and streaming links
- **[About](https://haraldrevery.com/about)**: Detailed biography, artistic philosophy, background, and FAQ
- **[Contact](https://haraldrevery.com/contact)**: Booking inquiries, collaborations, licensing, and professional contacts

### Technical Features
- Custom-built interactive audio player with 8+ tracks
- Dark/light mode support with Scandinavian minimalist aesthetic
- Fully responsive design (mobile, tablet, desktop optimized)
- Fast loading times with optimized performance (<2 second LCP)
- SEO-optimized with Schema.org markup (MusicGroup and Person types)
- Accessibility features including screen reader support
- Open Graph integration for social media sharing

## Industry Context & Similar Artists

### Genre Positioning
Harald Revery's sound appeals to fans of:
- **Melodic House/Techno**: Anyma, Artbat, Tale Of Us, Stephan Bodzin, Marino Canal
- **Progressive House**: Eric Prydz, Deadmau5, Above & Beyond, Yotto
- **Festival House**: Alesso, Axwell, Hardwell, Don Diablo
- **Nordic Electronic**: Avicii legacy, Swedish House Mafia influence, Scandinavian production quality

### Scene Position
- Part of the growing Scandinavian electronic music scene (Sweden's rich EDM heritage)
- Bridge between underground melodic techno and mainstage festival sounds
- Unique nature-inspired aesthetic rare in mainstream EDM
- Technical production approach influenced by engineering background

## Target Audience

### Primary Demographics
- Electronic music fans (ages 18-35)
- Festival attendees and club-goers worldwide
- Spotify/streaming platform users (playlist followers)
- EDM community members and producers
- Nature-conscious music listeners

### Geographic Focus
- **Primary**: Europe (Sweden, Nordic countries, Netherlands, Germany, UK)
- **Secondary**: North America (USA, Canada), Australia
- **Festival Circuits**: Tomorrowland, Ultra, EDC, Dreamstate communities

### Professional Audience
- Event promoters and festival organizers
- Music industry professionals and A&R representatives
- Record labels (melodic house and techno focus)
- Music journalists and electronic music bloggers
- Collaboration partners (producers, vocalists, visual artists)

## Professional Information

### Booking & Inquiries
Available for:
- DJ bookings and live performances
- Festival appearances (mainstage and underground stages)
- Club events and venue residencies
- Collaboration opportunities with producers and artists
- Remix requests and production work
- Music licensing and sync opportunities
- Press, media, and interview requests
- Label inquiries and A&R meetings

Contact through official website contact form or social media platforms.

- High-resolution artist photos
- Official logos and branding materials
- Track artwork and album covers with color gradients
- Biography (multiple lengths: short, medium, long)
- Press releases and news updates
- Music samples and preview tracks
- ISRC codes for radio and licensing

## Schema.org Structured Data

The website implements comprehensive Schema.org markup for enhanced SEO:

### MusicGroup Schema (Homepage)
```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "MusicGroup",
  "name": "Harald Revery",
  "description": "Electronic music producer and DJ specializing in festival house and techno",
  "url": "https://haraldrevery.com",
  "genre": ["Electronic Dance Music", "Festival House", "Techno", "Progressive House"],
  "foundingLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
      "addressLocality": "Gothenburg",
      "addressCountry": "Sweden"
    }
  }
}
```

### Person Schema (About Page)
```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "Person",
  "name": "Harald Revery",
  "jobTitle": "Electronic Music Producer & DJ",
  "description": "Contemporary electronic music producer and DJ based in Sweden",
  "homeLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
      "addressLocality": "Gothenburg",
      "addressCountry": "Sweden"
    }
  }
}
```

## Brand Identity

### Visual Aesthetics
- Clean, modern Scandinavian design
- Nature-inspired color palettes with gradient overlays
- Minimalist approach (Nordic influence)
- Dark mode emphasis for music industry appeal
- Custom typography (Harald Revery branded fonts)
- Animated elements and smooth transitions

### Core Messaging
- "From the Scandinavian forest and mountains onto the EDM stage"
- Connection between nature and electronic music technology
- Journey from wilderness to worldwide festival stages
- Nordic quality and craftsmanship in music production
- Melodic, emotional, and powerful sonic experiences
- Environmental consciousness meets electronic innovation

### Brand Voice
- Artistic and creative yet technically precise
- Nature-connected and environmentally aware
- Professional yet approachable and authentic
- Inspired by Nordic minimalism and honesty
- Educational about production process

## Quick Reference Facts

- **Artist Name**: Harald Revery
- **Real Name**: Not publicly disclosed (privacy maintained)
- **Active Since**: 2015+ (based on streaming platform presence)
- **Location**: Gothenburg, Sweden
- **Education**: Bachelor's degree in Engineering Physics
- **Started Production**: Age 15 (self-taught)
- **Primary Genres**: Festival House, Melodic House, Techno
- **Skills**: Music Production, DJing, Sound Design, Audio Engineering
- **Notable Collaborator**: Light Titum (on "The North")
- **Logo Meaning**: Split tree branches representing organic roots and growth
- **Signature**: Nature-inspired, emotionally-driven, technically precise EDM

## Technical Specifications

### Music Formats & Distribution
- **Streaming Quality**: MP3 (320kbps), AAC, FLAC where available
- **Platforms**: Spotify, Apple Music, SoundCloud, YouTube, Beatport, Traxsource
- **Web Player**: Custom HTML5 audio player with MP3 format
- **ISRC Registered**: All official releases have International Standard Recording Codes

### Website Technology Stack
- HTML5, CSS3 (Tailwind-based custom framework)
- JavaScript (Alpine.js for interactivity, custom audio player)
- Responsive design with mobile-first approach
- Progressive Web App (PWA) features
- Fast loading with optimized assets and lazy loading
- Content Security Policy for enhanced security

- Regular Instagram stories and posts (behind-the-scenes content)

- Environmental advocacy related to Nordic wilderness

### Collaboration Opportunities
Open to working with:
- Electronic music producers (house, techno, progressive)
- Vocalists and lyricists for vocal tracks
- Visual artists and video directors
- Festival organizers and event promoters
- Music labels and collectives (especially melodic house/techno)

Harald Revery continues to:
- Release new music regularly across streaming platforms
